text: Michel Amiel (born 1954) is a French politician who has been serving as a member of the French Senate since 2014. From 2017 until 2020, he was a member of La République En Marche! (LREM). ==Early life== Amiel was born on July 3, 1954.French Senate: Michel Amiel ==Career== Amiel has served as a member of the French Senate since 2014. He is also the Mayor of Les Pennes-Mirabeau. In March 2020, Amiel left LREM after Prime Minister Édouard Philippe announced he would push through a controversial pensions bill by executive decree.Le sénateur Michel Amiel quitte En marche ! à cause du 49.3, dénonçant le « cynisme et l’incompétence politique » Le Monde, March 1, 2020. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:French Senators of the Fifth Republic Category:Mayors of places in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Category:La République En Marche! politicians Category:Senators of Bouches-du- Rhône Category:People from Cannes
title: Michel Amiel
